title: Ticket #4312: Final status for aborted DAG is incorrect
description:
If a DAG is aborted (unless the abort-dag-on return value is 0) the final DAG status (in the node status fil) shows up as 

  DagStatus = 6; /* STATUS_ERROR (removed) */

when it should be 

  DagStatus = 6; /* STATUS_ERROR (aborted) */

(See the job_dagman_abort-B test, which is currently disabled because it fails because of this error.)
remarks:
2014-Jul-23 15:37:52 by wenger:
I was just working on this on V8_2-branch, but now I've created V8_2-gittrac_4312-branch for it.

2014-Aug-07 13:08:25 by wenger:
Note: I haven't added anything to the version history yet, because the version history item needs to go into 8.2.3, and my branch is older than that.

Also, once this all gets merged, job_dagman_abort-B should get enabled in master.

2014-Sep-22 13:30:34 by zmiller:
CODE REVIEW: Looks good!
